Question.Subject: How can I delete my Yahoo! Answers account?
Question.ChosenAnswer: * Go to yahoo answer.com and log into your account. * Look for the "Help" link, which is in the top right of the screen under the search box. * Choose the "Account Configuration" link under the "Using My Yahoo! Mail Account" section of the main Help page. * At the bottom of the page, you'll see a section called "Closing My Account". Choose the "How do I close my account?" link. * Follow the instructions on the screen to close your Yahoo account.
